Portfolio

About

We are a Data research organization that conducts social policy research on health care, disability, education, welfare, nutrition, and other topics providing data management, data analysis, project management, data visualization and researc study design and analysis

Using Regression Analysis, natural language processing or network analysis to yield crucial evidence and information for policy and decision makers!

Energy focus autocorrelation regression time series predictive analysis for electrical energy consumption at Boston Public Library.

Project 2

conceptualize and lead the development of regulatory compliant imaging, medical systems and devices from product requirements, risk management, feasibility studies, development, verification and validation to final product launch. Ensure regulatory compliance (ISO 13485), design control documentation and prototyping and testing.

  • Client: Parkinson Institute
  • Date: April 2017
  • Service: HEALTHCARE

Project 3

Process optical pattern recognition algorithm development and machine vision inspection automation, imaging and data processing in the final stages of product development and product introduction in a very competitive automation market.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: LIFESCIENCE

Project 4

Parthenode Stem Cell Research using QPCR, digital PCR and fluorescent probe assay design for genome editing diagnostics. CRISPR CAS to modify develomental stage proteins to illucidate and compare the mechanisms and signal transduction pathways of mouse vs human parthenote development.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Stem Cell Research

Project 5

Augmented Reality 3-D imaging for the tele-health space

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: TELE-HEALTH
